title: Video: Vondelpark – Dracula (Happa Remix)
body:
**[Happa](https://www.facebook.com/halfapersian)** is due to play his first [headline London show](https://www.facebook.com/events/390855260987977/?fref=ts) tomorrow at [Dalston’s Birthdays](https://www.facebook.com/birthdaysdalston), exciting stuff for the young Leeds based producer. His remix of the debut single from [**Vondelpark**’s](http://admin.crackintheroad.com/music/18687-video-vondelpark-dracula/ "Video: Vondelpark – Dracula") debut LP, _Seabed_, has been doing the rounds for a while now. Now we have a video, a stomach churning and rough and ready clusterfuck from the 90’s. It’s rather fitting, the remix is a damaged and at times ghostly reinterpretation of the original, the video is the same, the reasons for this however are far less clear.

_Seabed_ drops in February via R&S.

His remix of the debut single from Vondelpark’s debut LP, Seabed, has been doing the rounds for a while now. Now we have a video, a stomach churning and rough and ready clusterfuck \[…\]
